pageContext.description: TYPOLOGY:  thin butt tending to have flattened top; good rounded aubal thickening to body, but no defined bench line; e. bev. evid; no apparent shaping of sides on low flanges--but acc. v. slight lipping of body corners, MANUFACTURE:  sl. rippling of some sur.s--hammering; str.2 down body probl anc. grmks, CONDITION:   [ indecipherable, blurred] to mainly intact -  fairly sharp; one bl. tip 56. blunted, minor dents/chips
